channel.title: Need a little help
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need a little help"

item.title: Need a little help
item.content:encoded:
I was the 2. Jonin in Season 1 yesterday and I looped. I also spent the stamina on missions and some special missions.

Now, I discovered, that I missed the fact, that being the 2. opened Rock the world mission. I'm 16 stamina short to start it.

I would like to ask your help to click on my referral link, so I could start it, as it is only available today and it requires less Emo Rock CDs, than the B-Side version of the mission. I only need 4 people to click on it.

If you would like to help, click on this link please: http://www.animecubed.com/billy/?Nisemono.

Edit
I got it, big thanks for your help.
